requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or Radeon rx 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or Radeon rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
